mapper.update: update memberinfo set number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vipClass = #{vipClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, adress = #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, number, name, vipClass, balance, tel, gender, birthday, adress, remark from memberinfo
